name: Electro DMG Bonus
description: Increases the Electro DMG your Characters and Summons deal this Round. (Excluding Swirl DMG)
descriptionraw: Increases the <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K104]</color> your Characters and Summons deal this Round. (Excluding Swirl DMG)
